mapper.sql: a.pro_cd AS "proCd", a.REGION_CD AS "regionCd", a.SBJ_CD AS "sbjCd", a.REQ_CD AS "reqCd", a.PRO_TP AS "proTp", a.PRO_NM AS "proNm", a.YEAR AS "year", a.PAR_PRO_CD AS "parProCd", a.REF_PRO_CD AS "refProCd", a.BG_DT AS "bgDt", a.ED_DT AS "edDt", a.DP_CYC AS "dpCyc", a.PRO_STA AS "proSta", a.SCH_STAT AS "schStat", a.USR_CD AS "usrCd", a.USR_NM AS "usrNm", a.PUB_TM AS "pubTm", a.PRO_DESC AS "proDesc", a.ts AS "ts", a.nt AS "nt"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_SFRD_PRO a
1 = 1
and pro_cd = #{proCd}
and a.PRO_NM like '%'||#{proNm}||'%' '%'+#{proNm}+'%' concat('%',#{proNm},'%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SFRD_PRO( pro_cd, region_cd, sbj_cd, req_cd, pro_tp, pro_nm, year, par_pro_cd, ref_pro_cd, bg_dt, ed_dt, dp_cyc, pro_sta, sch_stat, usr_cd, usr_nm, pub_tm, pro_desc, nt ) VALUES ( #{proCd}, #{regionCd}, #{sbjCd}, #{reqCd}, #{proTp}, #{proNm}, #{year}, #{parProCd}, #{refProCd}, #{bgDt}, #{edDt}, #{dpCyc}, #{proSta}, #{schStat}, #{usrCd}, #{usrNm}, #{pubTm}, #{proDesc}, #{nt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SFRD_PRO SET region_cd = #{regionCd}, sbj_cd = #{sbjCd}, req_cd = #{reqCd}, pro_tp = #{proTp}, pro_nm = #{proNm}, year = #{year}, par_pro_cd = #{parProCd}, ref_pro_cd = #{refProCd}, bg_dt = #{bgDt}, ed_dt = #{edDt}, dp_cyc = #{dpCyc}, pro_sta = #{proSta}, sch_stat = #{schStat}, usr_cd = #{usrCd}, usr_nm = #{usrNm}, pub_tm = #{pubTm}, pro_desc = #{proDesc}, nt = #{nt} WHERE PRO_CD = #{proCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM (SELECT * FROM T_SFRD_PRO WHERE region_cd = #{regionCd} and sbj_cd = #{sbjCd} ORDER BY pro_cd desc ) a
rownum = 1
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY A.TS
